records.summary: Scottwiggam.com is a WordPress website built for the reelection of ScottWiggam for Wayne County Commissioner in Ohio.
Project ROTIA site is a WordPress website/theme built for the showcase of Project ROTIA projects. It is a subtheme of the WordPress 2013 theme

records.project_name: Faith and Miracles for all ministries Site
records.summary: This is a Drupal website and theme built for the Faith and Miracles for all ministries church in Malawi. This is an attempt to publicise the church and increase the number of numbers.
